tasks.label: Create LeetCode Problem
args: mkdir -p "${workspaceFolder}/leetcode/$(echo "${input:leetcodeProblem}" | tr -d '[:space:]')" && touch "${workspaceFolder}/leetcode/$(echo "${input:leetcodeProblem}" | tr -d '[:space:]')/main.go" && code "${workspaceFolder}/leetcode/$(echo "${input:leetcodeProblem}" | tr -d '[:space:]')/main.go"

inputs.description: Enter LeetCode problem name (e.g., 739. Daily Temperatures)
